document.masterDocTitle: To the knowledge of the Near East species of the genus Odocnemis Allard, 1876 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Helopini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: To the knowledge of the Near East species of the genus Odocnemis Allard, 1876 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Helopini)

bibRefCitation.author: Allard
bibRefCitation.refString: Allard, E. (1876) Revision des Helopines vrais de Lacordaire. L'Abeille, Journal d'Entomologie, 14, 1 - 80.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type localities.
O. punctata
: “Jérusalem” (erroneous, the lectotype is from “ Liban ”);
O. pseudoclara
: “ Libanon ”.

Type material.
Information about studied types of
O. punctata
and
O. pseudoclara
are given in Nabozhenko & Keskin (2016) .

Additional material.
Lebanon .

Redescription, illustrations and photos of type specimens see in Nabozhenko & Keskin (2016) .

Distribution. Turkey ( Hakkari Prov. ), Syria , Lebanon , Israel ( Nabozhenko & Keskin 2016 ). One female from southeast Turkey (south of Hakkari Prov. ) listed by Nabozhenko & Keskin (2016) differs slightly from Mediterranean populations of
O. punctata
. Status of this population probably will be revised after the study of males.

Bionomics. The species inhabits many biotopes, feeds on lichens on
Cedrus libani
,
Quercus
sp.,
Pinus
spp., on stones in high mountains.
